content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'root_synapsecicd21store_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [root_synapsecicd21store_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://synapsecicd21store.dfs.core.windows.net/root', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE weatheraggr (
	[datetime] date,
	[country_code] varchar(8000),
	[vendorID] int,
	[lpepPickupDatetime] datetime2(7),
	[passengerCount] int,
	[tripDistance] float,
	[tipAmount] float,
	[totalAmount] float,
	[tripType] int,
	[puYear] int,
	[puMonth] int,
	[month_num] int,
	[day_of_month] int,
	[day_of_week] int,
	[hour_of_day] int,
	[countryOrRegion] varchar(8000),
	[holidayName] varchar(8000),
	[normalizeHolidayName] varchar(8000),
	[isPaidTimeOff] bit,
	[date] datetime2(7),
	[avg_snowDepth] float,
	[avg_temperature] float,
	[max_precipTime] float,
	[max_precipDepth] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'nyc/nycweather/part-00000-ea289ab0-7671-4261-9260-c9887edd45d9-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [root_synapsecicd21store_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM weatheraggr
GO
